_header: Sinful man look up and see
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man by the Pains of the Passion — eight short lines

BLAru507.Transcription:
Synful man loke vp & see how reufulli I hyng on rodeAnd of me
                    penaunce haue pitee with sorughful herte & drery modeAlle þis man
                    I suffered for þe my flesh bee ryuen forbled my blodeLift vp þi
                    herte you calle on me forsakeyn synne haue mercy gode
BLAru507.Note: Two verse lines per manuscript line
BLAru507.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,

             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 1.156.

             “With an O and an I.” 
             Anglia
